General.Name: Helbor Empreendimentos S.A
General.Description: Helbor Empreendimentos S.A. engages in the real estate development activities in Brazil. The company was formerly known as Helbor Empreendimentos Imobiliarios Ltda. Helbor Empreendimentos S.A. was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Mogi das Cruzes, Brazil.
General.Address: Av. Vereador Narciso Yague Guimarães,1.1, Mogi Das Cruzes, SP, Brazil, 08710-500
